author: Bloomberg News
title: ‘Crisis like no other’: IMF says ‘Great Lockdown’ recession will be worst in almost 100 years
description: In a further sign of pessimism, the IMF sketched out three alternative scenarios in which the virus lasted longer than expected, returned in 2021 or both
content:
The International Monetary Fund predicted the “Great Lockdown” recession would be the steepest in almost a century and warned the world economy’s contraction and recovery would be worse than anticipated if the coronavirus lingers or returns.
